info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:54AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ogle County through 730 AM CDT... At 653 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stillman Valley, or 7 miles southeast of Byron, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Davis Junction, Hillcrest, Stillman Valley, Creston, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Kings and Chana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
